Attention: Please,

Trustees has finally instructed us the UBA Bank, Headquarters in

Dollars) to your Bank account and we have completed the arrangement
that as soon as you provide your personal information below including
your bank details, we will the transfer fund to your account
immediately.
So 
kindly reconfirm YOUR FULL DETAILS BELOW to enable us to transfer
your unclaimed compensation fund worth of US$1,500.000.00 (One Million
Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) to your bank account
within 24hrs.

Mr. Fred Moore (UBA Bank Managing)

subject: Re: UNITED BANK FOR AFRICA KAMPALA
body:
Hello Mr. Fred Moore,

Thank you for reaching out to me from United Bank for Africa UBA Uganda. I appreciate your willingness to assist me with transferring my unclaimed fund. However, before I provide any personal information, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure the legitimacy of this transaction.

1. How did you come across my unclaimed fund? Can you provide some background information on how it became unclaimed?

2. Is there any specific reason why the Board of Directors Trustees has chosen UBA Bank in Uganda to handle this transfer?

3. Could you please explain the process and timeline for transferring the funds into my bank account? Are there any fees or charges involved?

I look forward to your response and clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Helen
